# terminalephemeral
![pantheon-terminal-icons.svg](icons/pantheon-terminal-icons.svg){: style="height:64px;width:64px"}
## inherite from
[abcdesktopio/oc.template.ubuntu.gtk.language-pack-all](../abcdesktopio/oc.template.ubuntu.gtk.language-pack-all)
## Distribution
ubuntu ![ubuntu](icons/ubuntu.svg){: style="height:32px;"}

``` 
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="20.04.5 LTS (Focal Fossa)"
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS"
VERSION_ID="20.04"
HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy"
VERSION_CODENAME=focal
UBUNTU_CODENAME=focal

```


## Ubuntu packages

``` 
at-spi2-core gnome-terminal dbus-x11 pulseaudio-utils
```

## Arguments
`"--disable-factory --class=ephemeral"`
## Displayname


``` 
Terminal [ephemeral container]
```

## Path


``` 
/usr/bin/gnome-terminal
```

## ACL

``` json
{
    "permit": [
        "all"
    ]
}
```

## WM_CLASS

``` 
gnome-terminal-server.ephemeral
```

> The WM_CLASS property (of type STRING without control characters) contains two consecutive null-terminated strings. These specify the Instance and Class names to be used by both the client and the window manager for looking up resources for the application or as identifying information.
> to get the WM_CLASS property of an application, use the command line `wmctrl -lx`

## Desktopfile

``` 
/usr/share/applications/org.gnome.Terminal.desktop
```

> A .desktop file is a simple text file that holds information about a program. It is usually placed in “/usr/share/applications/”.



## JSON dump
json source file terminalephemeral.d.3.0.json 

``` json
{
    "acl": {
        "permit": [
            "all"
        ]
    },
    "cat": "development",
    "debpackage": "at-spi2-core gnome-terminal dbus-x11 pulseaudio-utils",
    "icon": "pantheon-terminal-icons.svg",
    "keyword": "ephemeral,terminal,shell",
    "launch": "gnome-terminal-server.ephemeral",
    "name": "terminalephemeral",
    "displayname": "Terminal [ephemeral container]",
    "path": "/usr/bin/gnome-terminal",
    "rules": {
        "homedir": {
            "default": false
        }
    },
    "host_config": {
        "mem_limit": "256M",
        "shm_size": "128M",
        "pid_mode": false,
        "ipc_mode": false
    },
    "args": "--disable-factory --class=ephemeral",
    "containerengine": "ephemeral_container",
    "template": "abcdesktopio/oc.template.ubuntu.gtk.language-pack-all",
    "desktopfile": "/usr/share/applications/org.gnome.Terminal.desktop"
}
```

## Install the builded image
>Replace the **ABCHOST** var set to localhost by default to your own server ip address

``` sh
ABCHOST=localhost
curl --output terminalephemeral.d.3.0.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/terminalephemeral.d.3.0.json
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: text/javascript' http://$ABCHOST:30443/API/manager/image -d @terminalephemeral.d.3.0.json

```

## Generated `DockerFile` source code

``` 
# Dynamic DockerFile application file for abcdesktopio generated by abcdesktopio/oc.apps/make.js
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
ARG TAG=dev
FROM abcdesktopio/oc.template.ubuntu.gtk.language-pack-all:$TAG
USER root
RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update && apt-get install -y  --no-install-recommends at-spi2-core gnome-terminal dbus-x11 pulseaudio-utils && apt-get clean
RUN echo 'debconf debconf/frontend select Noninteractive' | debconf-set-selections
LABEL oc.icon="pantheon-terminal-icons.svg"
LABEL oc.icondata=""
LABEL oc.keyword="terminalephemeral,ephemeral,terminal,shell"
LABEL oc.cat="development"
LABEL oc.desktopfile="org.gnome.Terminal.desktop"
LABEL oc.launch="gnome-terminal-server.ephemeral"
LABEL oc.template="abcdesktopio/oc.template.ubuntu.gtk.language-pack-all"
ENV ARGS="--disable-factory --class=ephemeral"
LABEL oc.name="terminalephemeral"
LABEL oc.displayname="Terminal [ephemeral container]"
LABEL oc.path="/usr/bin/gnome-terminal"
LABEL oc.type=app
LABEL oc.rules="{\"homedir\":{\"default\":false}}"
LABEL oc.acl="{\"permit\":[\"all\"]}"
LABEL oc.host_config="{\"mem_limit\":\"256M\",\"shm_size\":\"128M\",\"pid_mode\":false,\"ipc_mode\":false}"
RUN for d in /usr/share/icons /usr/share/pixmaps ; do echo "testing link in $d"; if [ -d $d ] && [ -x /composer/safelinks.sh ] ; then echo "fixing link in $d"; cd $d ; /composer/safelinks.sh ; fi; done
ENV APPNAME "terminalephemeral"
ENV APPBIN "/usr/bin/gnome-terminal"
LABEL oc.args="--disable-factory --class=ephemeral"
ENV APP "/usr/bin/gnome-terminal"
LABEL oc.containerengine="ephemeral_container"
USER root
RUN mkdir -p /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount
RUN for f in passwd shadow group gshadow ; do if [ -f /etc/$f ] ; then  cp /etc/$f /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount; rm -f /etc/$f; ln -s /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount/$f /etc/$f; fi; done
USER balloon
CMD [ "/composer/appli-docker-entrypoint.sh" ]

```

## Rebuild the image manually

### Download the Dockerfile manually
[Dockerfile for application terminalephemeral](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/terminalephemeral.d)
``` sh
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/terminalephemeral.d
```

### build the `Dockerfile` to create a container image

``` sh
docker build --build-arg TAG=3.0 -f terminalephemeral.d -t terminalephemeral .
```

### Install the new image
>If you are using `containerd` as container runtime, use the ctr command line

 
>If you are not running this bash command on your abcdesktop node
>Replace the **ABCHOST** variable set to localhost by default to your own server ip address


``` sh
ABCHOST=localhost
docker inspect terminalephemeral > terminalephemeral.json
docker image save terminalephemeral -o terminalephemeral.tar
ctr -n k8s.io images import terminalephemeral.tar
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: text/javascript' http://$ABCHOST:30443/API/manager/image -d @terminalephemeral.json

```
